postâ€‹

â–¸ post(base_url, endpoint, data, timeout?): Promise<APIResponse>

Makes a POST request to an API endpoint.

remarks

This is a "raw" function, you will likely want Device.post in order to pass the UUID.

Parametersâ€‹

NameTypeDefault valueDescription
base_urlstringundefinedThe API domain, with a trailing slash
endpointstringundefinedThe endpoint name
dataObjectundefinedA key-value map of parameters
